title: BREAKING: Illegal Muslim From Iran Arrested For Starting California Wildfire
text: BREAKING: Illegal Muslim From Iran Arrested For Starting California Wildfire Trending story found on dailypostfeed.com The California wildfires devastated the northern part of the state. Police initially arrested one suspect but released him after an investigation was conducted because the investigation led them to the actual person responsible for the fires: a 23-year-old man named Muhammad Islam.Islam was born [ Source: dailypostfeed.com ] [ Comments ] [ See why this is trending ] Share on Facebook Share on Twitter
